settings.content: There are two options for showing related products:
Same type: Picks some other products from the same product type.
Related tags: Group your products using tags of the form 'related-group1'. E.g. Assign three products the tag 'related-bag' & when you view one item, the other two will show as related products.
If you want to use the text overlay, enter the text in the following format, separated by the 'pipe' character:
Title | Main text | Price text | Button text
Glorious Eggs|These eggs were laid within three weeks of the winter solstice|£14.99|More Details
If you do not want an item to show (i.e. the price) then leave it empty.
Make sure URLs begin with / or http:// or https://

To make use of alt text (for SEO) or title text (pops up when you hover your mouse over the slide), enter this in the URL field using the pipe character like this: "http://www.shopify.com|alt-text|title-text"
Suggested size for all slide images: 940x400

settings.content: Widgets are configurable blocks that you can add to your homepage and sidebars. This list explains each widget that is available to use.
Page - Truncated: A content page, cut down to 200 characters with a 'Read more' link underneath
Page - Full: A full content page, this could contain anything from text, to an image, to an embedded video.
Page - No title: A full content page, without the page title.
Page - Full width: A full content page, spanning all three columns - this option is only available for widget 1, widgets 2 and 3 will be hidden if chosen.
Blog: Shows your 6 most recent blog articles, truncated to 200 characters
Product pile: 9 products tiled together - tip: follow the handle with a pipe '|' and a number to set the number to show, e.g. 'new-arrivals|6'
Custom: Add your own code into this one by editing the widget-custom.liquid template
